title: Riot currently supports people stealing your accounts and getting them banned
body:
This account i am still logged onto is stolen the person is playing it right now they refuse to shutdown the account and would rather allow them to troll and get the account banned so i wasted my money .
Its not enough proof the fact i sent a picture of me logged onto this account and that i have a picture of the email sent and the fact i know the password was changed today for them to give my my account back they want me to answer things like what were the refund tokens used on 3 years ago .

replies.body:
I went ahead and checked up on your ticket so that I could get a little context of what was going on already. It looks like someone was able to hack this account, that much I can see. The reason why providing emails showing a password reset doesn't work is because the hacker could have had access to your own email as well. If someone was able to get access to your account, there's a preeeeeetty good chance that they could be logged on here or on your email as well. 

I know it's not exactly what you're wanting to hear right now, but take a little time to look over the questions that agent asked and do you best to come up with any guesses at least. The questions are designed so that nobody except the original creator who played consistently on the account would know them.
Just do me the favor of shutting down the account for now i would appreciate that very much .Unless they can prove it is theres .

No worries, this account will be kept safe until it can be recovered by the original creator. I know those questions can be difficult, but they're designed so that *only* the creator who played on the account for its lifetime could know them. Take some time to look over those questions, and feel free to take your best guesses. Guessing wrong won't lock you out of trying to recover it.
